name: TokTikMode
description: "Vertical" mode for Geometry Dash. Best on Android.

compatibilityMode.name: Compatibility Mode
compatibilityMode.description:
If a level has rotation or scale triggers, this mod will not go further beyond rotating the screen.

<cy>You can go thank RobTop for this silly blunder; apparently the screen needs to be at *exactly* 1.000 scale to have rotation and scale triggers work properly.</c>

rotationDegrees.name: Rotation (Degrees)
rotationDegrees.description:
The number of degrees you want to rotate your gameplay screen to.

<cy>To disable, set this setting to "0".</c>

<cy>Otherwise, choose either</c> <cl>"90"</c> <cy>or</c> <cl>"270"</c> <cy>degrees.</c>

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
